General.PostProcessingCommand: $found=0; foreach ($x in $configFile.VMDiskConfig) { if ($x.VMType -eq 'PARAMETER') { $found = 1; Set-Variable -scope global -name vmtype -value $x.VMType } }; $found
if ('PARAMETER' -match 'SUSE') { Set-Variable -scope global -name distribution -value 'SUSE' }; if ('PARAMETER' -match 'Red Hat') { Set-Variable -scope global -name distribution -value 'RedHat' } ; 1

SUSE.Description: Check if sapconf profile for SAP HANA applied

RedHat.Description: Check if tuned profile for SAP HANA is applied

SUSE.ProcessingCommand: expectedresult='Timeout (watchdog) : 60'; result=0; for i in $(echo $p_password | sudo -S cat /etc/sysconfig/sbd | grep '^SBD_DEVICE' | cut -d '=' -f 2 | tr ';' ' '); do resultcommand=$(echo $p_password | sudo -S sbd -d ${i} dump | grep watchdog); if [[ $resultcommand == $expectedresult ]]; then result=$((result + 1)); else result=$((result - 10)); fi; done; if [ $result -gt 0 ]; then echo 'OK'; else echo 'ERROR'; fi
SUSE.ErrorMessage: change the SBD watchdog timeout to 60

SUSE.ProcessingCommand: expectedresult='Timeout (msgwait)  : 120'; result=0; for i in $(echo $p_password | sudo -S cat /etc/sysconfig/sbd | grep '^SBD_DEVICE' | cut -d '=' -f 2 | tr ';' ' '); do resultcommand=$(echo $p_password | sudo -S sbd -d ${i} dump | grep msgwait); if [[ $resultcommand == $expectedresult ]]; then result=$((result + 1)); else result=$((result - 10)); fi; done; if [ $result -gt 0 ]; then echo 'OK'; else echo 'ERROR'; fi
SUSE.ErrorMessage: change the SBD msgwait timeout to 120
